Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
EnableLogging_Description: Enables logging of API calls and responses to a separate logfile for troubleshooting purposes
AllowAddMeetingLinkToEvent_Description: Allows for adding Jitsi Meet link when editing an event in calendar
ChatUsernameFormat_Description: Defines how chat username is generated from email address: 0 - username, 1 - username.domain (without TLD), 2 - username.domain.tld
